messages.content:
Perfect! Let me create a summary of what's been cleaned and organized:

  ✅ Repository Cleaning & Organization Complete!

  🎯 What Was Organized:

  1. Phase Completion Reports → 
  docs/06-research-analysis/completion-reports/

  - ✅ PHASE-1C-STATUS-REPORT.md (30-page comprehensive report)
  - ✅ PHASE-1C-QUICK-REFERENCE.md (6-page quick reference)
  - ✅ PHASE-1C-COMPLETION-SUMMARY.md (executive summary)
  - ✅ PHASE-B-COMPLETION-REPORT.md (Phase B analysis)
  - ✅ Created README.md index for completion-reports

  Before: 4 files scattered in root and docs/
  After: All organized in docs/06-research-analysis/completion-reports/

  2. Security: API Keys Protected → .gitignore

  - ✅ Added *.key to prevent API key commits
  - ✅ Added *.pem, *.p12, *.pfx (certificates)
  - ✅ Added .env and .env.* (environment secrets)
  - ✅ Added specific patterns: hal-mac-os-anthropic.key, etc.

  Before: API keys could be accidentally committed
  After: All secrets automatically ignored by git

  3. Root Directory Cleaned

  Removed from root:
  - ❌ PHASE-1C-STATUS-REPORT.md → moved to completion-reports/
  - ❌ PHASE-1C-QUICK-REFERENCE.md → moved to completion-reports/
  - ❌ PHASE-B-COMPLETION-REPORT.md → moved to completion-reports/
  - ❌ 2025-11-22-EXPORT-...txt → obsolete, deleted

  Protected in root (ignored):
  - ✅ hal-mac-os-anthropic.key (API key)
  - ✅ *.log files (already ignored)
  - ✅ coditect_core.egg-info (build artifact, already ignored)

  4. Phase 1C Implementation Committed

  - ✅ All 7 LLM providers (llm_abstractions/)
